about_the_game:
Players move through the stage by rolling bombs and jumping,
The player moves through the stage by rolling bombs and jumping to reach a goal in the sky above.

Obstacles are placed along the path that the player ascends, and the content of the obstacles
The obstacles change depending on the height of the player's ascent.

Obstacles include slopes, moving floors, and other devices that take damage.

If the player receives more than a certain amount of damage, the obstacle will explode, and the game is over when the player runs out of remaining
Be careful.

Also, be aware that there is a possibility of mental damage when you are blocked by obstacles in this game.
The player can use jump actions or explode by himself.

Players must use jump actions and their own explosions to clear a path and reach the goal,
and explosions to clear a path and reach the goal as fast as possible.

name: RiseExplosion

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Any modern x64 CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 compliant video card with 1 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any modern sound card

short_description: Easy rolling action game. Surmount the obstacles to get to the goal.
